wifiStrings.Instructions.Slide0.translation: Find and tap on your device's Settings icon

wifiStrings.Instructions.Slide1.translation: Select the WiFi section from your settings menu

wifiStrings.Instructions.Slide2.translation:
Choose Cozmo from the network list.
Raise Lift to view network name.

wifiStrings.Instructions.Slide3.translation: Enter the Wifi password if one is shown on your Cozmo

wifiStrings.Instructions.Slide4.translation: Exit Settings and tap on your Cozmo app

wifiStrings.Instructions.Slide0.viewAll.translation: Swipe to read all the instructions first!

wifi.gethelp.description.translation:
Having trouble? Try the following:
1. Turn your device's wifi off and then on again.
2. Remove then place Cozmo on his charger.

still stuck? visit support.anki.com
